com.greystripe.sdk
Interface GSAd

All Known Implementing Classes:
GSFullscreenAd, GSLeaderboardAdView, GSMediumRectangleAdView, GSMobileBannerAdView
public interface GSAd

An interface that all ads implement.

Method Summary
 void addListener(GSAdListener listener)
          Register an AdListener to be notified of ad receipt, dismissal, and click messages.
 int getId()
          Get the ad id if one is fetched and ready to display.
 boolean isAdReady()
          Indicates that an ad is fetched and ready to display.
 void removeListener(GSAdListener listener)
          Remove an AdListener to stop listening to ad messages.
 

Method Detail

isAdReady

boolean isAdReady()
Indicates that an ad is fetched and ready to display. There is nothing that would prevent the display from occurring (e.g. no network connectivity).

Returns:
True if an ad is ready to display and a display is possible

getId

int getId()
Get the ad id if one is fetched and ready to display.

Returns:
The ad id of an ad that's ready to display. If no ad is ready to display or the ad is broken, this returns -1.

addListener

void addListener(GSAdListener listener)
Register an AdListener to be notified of ad receipt, dismissal, and click messages.

Parameters:
listener - The AdListener to add.

removeListener

void removeListener(GSAdListener listener)
Remove an AdListener to stop listening to ad messages.

Parameters:
listener - The AdListener to remove.
